CRATE.command.create.de-DE: [grey]Du hast die [era_purple]Crate</color> mit der ID [era_purple][id]</color> [green]erfolgreich</color> erstellt!</color>
CRATE.command.create.en-US: [grey]You have crated the [era_purple]Crate</color> with the ID [era_purple][id]</color> [green]successfully</color>!

CRATE.command.delete.de-DE: [grey]Du hast die [era_purple]Crate</color> mit der ID [era_purple][id]</color> [green]erfolgreich</color> gelöscht!</color>
CRATE.command.delete.en-US: [grey]You have deleted the [era_purple]Crate</color> with the ID [era_purple][id]</color> [green]successfully!</color></color>

CRATE.command.key.add.de-DE: [grey]Du hast den [era_purple]Key</color> mit der ID [era_purple][id]</color> [green]erfolgreich</color> zur [era_purple]Crate</color> mit der ID [era_purple][id]</color> hinzugefügt!</color>
CRATE.command.key.add.en-US: [grey]You have added the [era_purple]Key</color> with the ID [era_purple][id]</color> [green]successfully</color> to the [era_purple]Crate</color> with the ID [era_purple][id]!</color></color>

CRATE.command.key.add.error.item.air.de-DE: [grey]Dieses Item kann [red]nicht</color> als Key verwendet werden!</color>
CRATE.command.key.add.error.item.air.en-US: [grey]This item can [red]not</color> be used as a key!</color>

CRATE.command.key.remove.de-DE: [grey]Du hast den [era_purple]Key</color> mit der ID [era_purple][id]</color> [green]erfolgreich</color> von der [era_purple]Crate</color> mit der ID [era_purple][id]</color> entfernt!</color>
CRATE.command.key.remove.en-US: [grey]You have removed the [era_purple]Key</color> with the ID [era_purple][id]</color> [green]successfully</color> from the [era_purple]Crate</color> with the ID [era_purple][id]!</color></color>

CRATE.command.keyall.en-US: [grey]You have given the [era_purple]Key</color> with the ID [era_purple][id]</color> [green]successfully</color> to all players!</color>

CRATE.command.item.add.de-DE: [grey]Du hast das [era_purple]Item</color> mit der ID [era_purple][id]</color> [green]erfolgreich</color> zur [era_purple]Crate</color> mit der ID [era_purple][id]</color> hinzugefügt!</color>
CRATE.command.item.add.en-US: [grey]You have added the [era_purple]Item</color> with the ID [era_purple][id]</color> [green]successfully</color> to the [era_purple]Crate</color> with the ID [era_purple][id]!</color></color>

CRATE.command.item.remove.de-DE: [grey]Du hast das [era_purple]Item</color> mit der ID [era_purple][id]</color> [green]erfolgreich</color> von der [era_purple]Crate</color> mit der ID [era_purple][id]</color> entfernt!</color>
CRATE.command.item.remove.en-US: [grey]You have removed the [era_purple]Item</color> with the ID [era_purple][id]</color> [green]successfully</color> from the [era_purple]Crate</color> with the ID [era_purple][id]!</color></color>

CRATE.command.block.remove.en-US: [grey]The block [era_purple][location]</color> is no longer a [era_purple]crate block!</color></color>

CRATE.command.block.add.error.invalid.en-US: [grey]You can [red]not</color> set this block as a [era_purple]crate block!</color></color>
